title: An Exact relation of the grand ceremony of the marraige of Charles the II the most Catholick king, with the most illustrious princess Mademoiselle Marie Louise d'Orleans, neice to the High and Mighty Monarch Charles the II, King of Great Britain, by the mothers, and to Lewis the XIV, the present French king, by the father's side as it was performed at Fontainbleau by Cardinal Bouillon, the Prince of Conti being proxey in behalf of the most Catholick king / by an eye-witness, as it was printed at Paris, and faithfully translated.
author: Eye witness.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
